actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, as amended, to allow a deduction to tenants of houses, apartments, or other dwelling units used as their principal residence.

summary.text: Allows an itemized tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code up to $600 to tenants of houses, apartments, or other dwelling units used as their principal residence.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, as amended, to allow a deduction to tenants of houses, apartments, or other dwelling units used as their principal residence.
